pullrequest.title: Added deprecation warning prints extending pull request #2622

content.raw:
True, people should pay attention to compiler warnings, even though many probably don't pay enough attention ;)

So you mean we'll add it to gazebo 7-9?

I've changed the text and also added it to Model.cc, is that better? Once this is approved I can send the same PR to the other release branches too.
content.html:
True, people should pay attention to compiler warnings, even though many probably don't pay enough attention ;)
